scripts.postinstall: concurrently -n "shared,client,server" "npm run shared-install" "npm run client-install" "npm run server-install"
scripts.shared-install: cd shared && npm install && npm run build
scripts.lint: concurrently -n "client,server,shared" "cd client && npm run lint" "cd server && npm run lint" "cd shared && npm run lint"
scripts.debug: concurrently -n "client,server" "npm run client" "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--inspect-brk=9229 npm run server"
